info.title: USA Today Book Reviews
info.description: The USA TODAY Book Reviews API provides a method for retrieving USA TODAY's book reviews conent. In addition to the textual content of a review, the API returns various types of metadata associated with each title. All reviews information is available in a JSON handler.

get.description: The USA TODAY Best-Selling Books API provides a method for retrieving the weekly list of the nationu2019s top-selling books as compiled by USA TODAY and published each Thursday. In addition, the API can be used to access a titles history on the list and metadata about each title. All bestseller information is available in a custom handler.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: The API key used for the query

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: A call to the /categories directory returns a list of categories used to classify books.

parameters.name: class
parameters.description: A call to the /classes directory returns a list of available book classes (fiction or non-fiction).

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Programmers may specify the number of books they would like returned in a list.

parameters.name: dates
parameters.description: Specifying a year within the dates directory returns the dates of each weekly books list for that particular year.

parameters.name: maxyear
parameters.description: Programmers can use minyear and maxyear to establish a year range for the data returned.

parameters.name: minyear
parameters.description: Programmers can use minyear and maxyear to establish a year range for the data returned.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: A call to the /titles directory returns a list of titles that have appeared on the books list.

get.description: The USA TODAY Book Reviews API provides a method for retrieving USA TODAYs book reviews content. In addition to the textual content of a review, the API returns various types of metadata associated with each title. All reviews information is available in a JSON handler.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: The API key used for the query

parameters.name: audiobooks
parameters.description: This parameter allows the developer to filter audiobook reviews. Setting audiobooks to y will return only audiobooks, and setting it to n will return only non-audiobook reviews. By default, the Books Reviews API returns all available content.

parameters.name: authors
parameters.description: Returns a list of all available authors with book reviews.

parameters.name: batch
parameters.description: Oftentimes, articles are published that contain multiple book reviews. Setting batch to y will return only these batch reviews, and setting it to n will return only non-batch reviews. By default, the Books Reviews API returns all available content.

parameters.name: books
parameters.description: By default, returns the most 25 most recent reviews. The number of reviews returned may be altered using the count parameter.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Use this value to set the number of reviews returned. By default, mostrecent directory returns 25 reviews and the book and author directories return all avaialable information.

parameters.name: recent
parameters.description: Returns a list of all available book reviews.
